org.apache.flex.abc.graph

Interface IBasicBlock

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Block

    public interface IBasicBlock
    IBasicBlock defines the minimum necessary semantics of a vertex in an AET method body's IFlowgraph.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canFallThrough()
      Can this block's control fall through the end?
      Instruction get(int idx)
      Fetch the Instruction at the specified position.
      List<Instruction> getInstructions()
      Get the contents of the block.
      Collection<? extends IBasicBlock> getSuccessors()
      Get this block's successors; this defines the set of edges in the flowgraph.
      int size()
      How big is this block?

    • Method Detail

      • getSuccessors

        Collection<? extends IBasicBlock> getSuccessors()
        Get this block's successors; this defines the set of edges in the flowgraph.
        Returns:
        this block's successors in the control-flow graph.

      • getInstructions

        List<Instruction> getInstructions()
        Get the contents of the block.
        Returns:
        this block's instructions as a mutable List.

      • size

        int size()
        How big is this block?
        Returns:
        the size of getInstructions.size().

      • get

        Instruction get(int idx)
        Fetch the Instruction at the specified position.
        Parameters:
        idx - - the Instruction's position.
        Returns:
        the Instruction at that position.

      • canFallThrough

        boolean canFallThrough()
        Can this block's control fall through the end?
        Returns:
        true if the block doesn't unconditionally transfer control.
